snippet.title: Gym Empire - Gym Tycoon Simulation & Management Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Gym Empire Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/756300/Gym_Empire__Gym_Tycoon_Sim_Management/

Build and manage your Gym Empire to make it the best in the world. Hire staff, train clients and specialise your gym in the first ever gym management sim. 

Experience the excitement and passion of starting from the bottom and building your way to the top. With endless choices on how you manage your gym. Use different strategies to attract different types of clients. Manage your funds and make sure you don't have to spend too much on injury lawyers by hiring staff that can safely train your clients. Manage client training yourself and you might just end up creating a future celebrity, who can then bring in sponsorships and a lot more popularity to your gym.

Gym Empire is the first ever gym tycoon sim management game of it's kind.

You take on the role of a personal trainer with dreams of becoming a gym tycoon. Trying to make ends meet. Manage and train clients in your garage. Build your way up to number one on the block, the city, the country and the world by building your Gym Empire how you want. Will you make a commercial gym or specialise in a certain field? Will you focus on training clients yourself or hire staff to train clients while you focus on managing your Gym Empire? The choice is yours.

Gym Empire brings the engrossing world of strategy, building, sim and management to the fitness industry with the fun and immersion of classic tycoon games. In the same way that Two Point Hospital brought back the fun of Theme Hospital. 

Features

[*]Immersive gym tycoon sim management
[*]Personally manage and train clients
[*]Hire staff to help training as your client base grows
[*]Build from garage to storage closet to world renowned gym
[*]Specialise your gym or keep it commercial
[*]Choose between micro management or overall business management
[*]Train clients to go on to become celebrities
[*]Strike deals with sponsors
[*]Avoid lawsuits by looking after your clients

WEBSITE https://www.chronikspartan.com
SPARTAN MEMBERSHIP https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC62l... 
OUR INDIE GAMES https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Chronik+Spartan
CONTACT ME indie@chronikspartan.com For collaborations, reviews, and business inquiries
INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/chronikspartan
TWITTER https://twitter.com/chronik_spartan
DISCORD https://discord.gg/XPU6x5R
PATREON https://www.patreon.com/chronikspartan

Music: https://www.bensound.com
License code: SRDGAXI36I7ES0T1
